survey_name: AI-Powered Job Search Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and experiences with AI-powered job search platforms, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered job search platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use AI-powered job search platforms?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in AI-powered job search platforms? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Limit to 7 options for readability.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in AI-powered job search platforms? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of job recommendations provided by the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of job recommendations provided by the platform?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using AI-powered job search platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using AI-powered job search platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to others?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would improve your experience with the platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following would improve your experience with the platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is it for the platform to provide explanations for its job recommendations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to gauge importance. Ensure options are balanced.

script.question_text: How important is it for the platform to provide explanations for its job recommendations?

questions.question_text: Have you successfully secured a job through an AI-powered job search platform?
questions.client_notes: Binary question for quick response. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: Have you successfully secured a job through an AI-powered job search platform?

questions.question_text: If yes, how long did it take you to secure a job using the platform?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q8 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown for space efficiency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: dropdown (SINGLE_CHOICE). Routing depends on Q8.

script.question_text: If yes, how long did it take you to secure a job using the platform?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q8 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in AI-powered job search platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture innovative ideas. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in AI-powered job search platforms?
